name: Unfreeze
description:
Gameplay Overview:

You play as Fi, a greedy Fire Spirit in search of Hot Sauce and Gold. Luckily, He found one in the lair of the Ice Dragon atop the mountain.  Unlock 3 Different Endings and take what is rightfully yours! 

Controls:

WASD Movement

Hold Left Click for Charge Up and LAUNCH!

CREDITS:

ESTHER FUNG - TECHNICAL ARTIST & SOUND DESIGNER 

ANGELA LY - CONCEPT ARTIST & STORY ARTIST
